author: Christopher McFadden
title: China unveils 2.47kW portable laser weapon that works in Arctic cold, Saharan desert
description: The laser beams enough power to disable drones and cut through several kinds of materials from over 0.62 miles (1 km) away.
content: Chinese scientists have developed a portable 2-kilowatt (kW) fiber laser weapon that can operate in extreme temperatures. Reportedly capable of functioning in conditions between -58°F (-50°C) and 122… [+3570 chars]

title: Nitecore TIKI 300 Lumen Keychain Flashlight
